rules_text:
Whenever Keeper of Death's Mysteries attacks, exile the top card of each player's library.
Once each turn, you may play a noncreature card exiled with Keeper of Death's Mysteries, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
Escape–{4}{U}{U}, Exile six other cards from your graveyard [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
